argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | isumcl.1 | |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) |
| 2 |  | isumcl.2 | |- ( ph -> M e. ZZ ) |
| 3 |  | isumcl.3 | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( F ` k ) = A ) |
| 4 |  | isumcl.4 | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> A e. CC ) |
| 5 |  | isumcl.5 | |- ( ph -> seq M ( + , F ) e. dom ~~> ) |
| 6 |  | summulc.6 | |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) |
| 7 |  | isumdivc.7 | |- ( ph -> B =/= 0 ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_reccld | |- ( ph -> ( 1 / B ) e. CC ) |
| 9 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 8 | #P_isummulc1 | |- ( ph -> ( sum_ k e. Z A x. ( 1 / B ) ) = sum_ k e. Z ( A x. ( 1 / B ) ) ) |
| 10 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 | #P_isumcl | |- ( ph -> sum_ k e. Z A e. CC ) |
| 11 | 10, 6, 7 | #P_divrecd | |- ( ph -> ( sum_ k e. Z A / B ) = ( sum_ k e. Z A x. ( 1 / B ) ) ) |
| 12 | 6 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> B e. CC ) |
| 13 | 7 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> B =/= 0 ) |
| 14 | 4, 12, 13 | #P_divrecd | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( A / B ) = ( A x. ( 1 / B ) ) ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_sumeq2dv | |- ( ph -> sum_ k e. Z ( A / B ) = sum_ k e. Z ( A x. ( 1 / B ) ) ) |
| 16 | 9, 11, 15 | #P_3eqtr4d | |- ( ph -> ( sum_ k e. Z A / B ) = sum_ k e. Z ( A / B ) ) |
